Conversational QA: 基于以上对话内容，根据提问，仅输出候选选项中的正确答案对应的序号【提问】{test_question}【候选选项】{option_str}
Emotion Classification: 基于以上对话内容，根据提问，仅输出候选选项中的正确答案对应的序号【提问】{test_question}【候选选项】{option_str}
Slot Filling: 基于以上对话内容，根据提问，仅输出候选选项中的正确答案对应的序号【提问】{test_question}【候选选项】{option_str}
Dialogue NLI: 基于以上对话内容，判断假设与对话内容之间的语义关系，仅输出候选选项中的正确答案对应的序号【假设】{hypothesis}【候选选项】{option_str}
Relation Classification: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个选项符合该对话体现的双方人物关系，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【候选选项】{option_str}
Offensive Detection: 基于以上对话内容，分析该对话是否存在言论冒犯的情况，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【候选选项】{option_str}
Dialogue Infilling: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个选项是给定答案对应的提问，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【答案】{response}【候选选项】{option_str}
Multi-turn Response Selection: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个选项是该对话上下文最连贯且最恰当的回复，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【候选选项】{option_str}
Dialogue Summarization: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个选项是该对话最合适的摘要，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【候选选项】{option_str}
Knowledge-grounded Dialogue: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个回复最符合给定的知识，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【知识】{knowledge}【候选选项】{option_str}
Fact Correctness: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个回复包含正确的常识知识，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【候选选项】{option_str}
Persona-grounded Dialogue: 基于以上对话内容，分析候选选项中哪一个回复最符合给定的人物性格，仅输出候选选项中相应的序号【人物性格】{persona}【候选选项】{option_str}
Dialogue NLI Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，推理目标陈述句与对话内容之间的语义关系，生成正确的答案【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【假设】{hypothesis}【答案】
Relation Classification Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，生成最符合该对话所体现的双方人物关系【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【人物关系】
Offensive Detection Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，判断该对话是否存在言论冒犯的情况【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【答案】
Knowledge-grounded Dialogue Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容和知识，生成最符合给定知识的回复【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【知识】{knowledge}【回复】
Conversational QA Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，根据给定的提问，生成正确的答案【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【提问】{test_question}【答案】
Emotion Classification Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，根据给定的提问，生成正确的答案【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【提问】{test_question}【答案】
Slot Filling Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，根据给定的提问，生成正确的答案【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【提问】{test_question}【答案】
Dialogue Infilling Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容和最后一个轮次的系统回复，补全最后一个轮次中合理的用户话语【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【回复】{response}【用户话语】
Multi-turn Response Selection Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，生成最连贯以及最合理的回复【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【回复】
Dialogue Summarization Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，生成该对话最合适的摘要【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【摘要】
Fact Correctness Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容，生成包含正确常识知识的回复【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【回复】
Persona-grounded Dialogue Pretrain: 读取以下对话内容和人物性格，生成最符合给定人物性格的回复【对话内容】{dialogue_content}【人物性格】{persona}【回复】
Conversational QA En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, only output the option letter corresponding to the correct answer in the candidate options according to the question【Question】{test_question}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Emotion Classification En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, only output the option letter corresponding to the correct answer in the candidate options according to the question【Question】{test_question}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Slot Filling En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, only output the option letter corresponding to the correct answer in the candidate options according to the question【Question】{test_question}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Dialogue NLI En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the semantic relationship between the hypothesis and the dialogue content, only output the option letter corresponding to the correct answer in the candidate options【Hypothesis】{hypothesis}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Relation Classification En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options is in line with the relationship between the two characters in the dialogue, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Candidate options】{option_str}
Offensive Detection En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of whether there is any offensive speech in the dialogue, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Candidate options】{option_str}
Dialogue Infilling En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options is the question corresponding to the given answer, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Answer】{response}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Multi-turn Response Selection En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options can best answer the dialogue context, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Candidate options】{option_str}
Dialogue Summarization En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options is the most suitable summary of the dialogue, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Candidate options】{option_str}
Knowledge-grounded Dialogue En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options is the most suitable reply to the given knowledge, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Knowledge】{knowledge}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Fact Correctness En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options contains the correct common sense knowledge, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Candidate options】{option_str}
Fact_Correctness En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options contains the correct common sense knowledge, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Candidate options】{option_str}
Persona-grounded Dialogue En: Based on the content of the above dialogue, according to the analysis of which option in the candidate options is the most suitable reply to the given character personality, only output the corresponding option letter in the candidate options【Persona】{persona}【Candidate options】{option_str}
Dialogue NLI Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, according to the semantic relationship between the target statement and the dialogue content, generate the correct answer【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Hypothesis】{hypothesis}【Answer】
Relation Classification Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, generate the relationship between the two characters that best reflects the dialogue【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Relationship】
Offensive Detection Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, judge whether there is any offensive speech in the dialogue【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Answer】
Knowledge-grounded Dialogue Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content and knowledge, generate the reply that best matches the given knowledge【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Knowledge】{knowledge}【Reply】
Conversational QA Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, generate the correct answer according to the given question【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Question】{test_question}【Answer】
Emotion Classification Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, generate the correct answer according to the given question【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Question】{test_question}【Answer】
Slot Filling Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, generate the correct answer according to the given question【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Question】{test_question}【Answer】
Dialogue Infilling Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content and the system reply in the last round, complete the reasonable user speech in the last round【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Reply】{response}【User speech】
Multi-turn Response Selection Pretrain E: Read the following dialogue content, generate the most coherent and reasonable reply【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Reply】
Dialogue Summarization Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, generate the most suitable summary of the dialogue【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Summary】
Fact Correctness Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content, generate a reply containing correct common sense knowledge【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Reply】
Persona-grounded Dialogue Pretrain En: Read the following dialogue content and character personality, generate the reply that best matches the given character personality【Dialogue content】{dialogue_content}【Persona】{persona}【Reply】
